question_body: My internet service is very expensive, is there some way to drastically cut the cost of connecting to the internet?

reference.text: There are a few ways you can try to reduce your internet costs. First, consider shopping around and comparing prices from different internet service providers in your area. You may be able to find a better deal. Second, try negotiating with your current provider to see if they can offer you a lower rate or better package. Finally, consider downsizing your plan to a lower speed or data cap if you're not using all the data you're paying for. Additionally, some cities offer free public Wi-Fi in certain locations or times of day that you can take advantage of.
